short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy & intuitive tally counter for keeping track of anything you want.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- lightweight
- syncs between all your devices
- super easy to use
- ability to export data to .csv
- reorder items
- toggle dark mode
- keyboard shortcuts so you don't have to click :-)

To set hotkeys / keyboard shortcuts, copy this link into the address bar: chrome://extensions/shortcuts

If you want any features added, you find a bug or something is behaving unexpectedly, please contact me at capdavidd@gmail.com.

Donations are welcome at https://ko-fi.com/davidcap. <3
